info.title: Zelda ROTH
info.author: Wiimpathy
info.details:
A port of Zelda Return of the Hylian to the Wii.

  HOW TO PLAY :
  
  WIIMOTE/NUNCHUCK
  * A:		Confirm/open menu
  * B:		Sword
  * 1:		Read/open/talk
  * 2:		Use object
  * -:		Display enemies
  * +:		Map
  * Home:	Save/quit
  * Z:		Run
  * C:		Glove

  CLASSIC CONTROLLER
  * A:		Confirm/open menu
  * B:		Sword
  * X:		Use object
  * Y:		Read/open/talk
  * -:		Display enemies
  * +:		Map
  * Home:	Save/quit
  * L:		Run
  * R:		Glove
  * ZL:		Look around

  CREDITS :
  Vincent Jouillat, HunoPPC(OS4 version), etc...
